20 events found. Views Navigation Event Views Navigation List List Month Today 9/13/2025 September 13 – 10/1/2025 October 1 Select date. September 2025 Sat 13 September 13 @ 9:00 am […]

About Us
99 Bottles is built as a craft beer experience unlike any other! From first pour until last call, we love to welcome you on your own experience of craft beer, boutique wines, and extraordinary liquids of the finest kind.
What Makes 99 Bottles Different?
Founded in April 2019, 99 Bottles is about the experience of extraordinary liquid. Built by a team of passionate hospitality professionals and an experience in this space where there is not a bad beer in the place. 99 Bottles is what happens when someone who loves great beer lets his imagination run wild. A beer bar where “what if we put this on draft?” becomes “why didn’t we think of that sooner?” The place where world-class pilsners share a tap list with Rosé All Day and hazy IPAs. A world where kombucha has a tap and so does prosecco – whatever your taste, this is where you find your new favorite. Like Willy Wonka’s factory meets an art gallery for beer lovers – and every exhibit is meant to be tasted!
The team at 99 Bottles has looked at (and likely tasted) every beer on the wall and approved it for your drinking pleasure. Every beer, like every musician in a symphony, has a place in the symphony. Whether a classic brown ale, an old school West Coast IPA, or a turbid tornado from New England, the name of the game is 99 Bottles – and they’re all meant to be taken down and passed around!
Join Us For
Bagel Brunch
Learn More
Every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. Real deal NY bagels — par baked, flash frozen, shipped from New York and finished that morning in our oven — and bagel sandwiches, wrapped in white butcher paper, just like you get from the corner bodega.
We Are Fans Of...

Back to Calendar
Beer & Food Pairing Event
September 8
@
6:00 pm
Event Details
99 Bottles has partnered with Chef Jeremy Davis from Tamiami Trail Catering to present a Beer & Food Pairing Event!
this will be a ticketed event, limited to just a maximum of 20 guests.
99 bottles will be closed from the public during the event.
tickets will cost 80.00 total per person….
– total ticket price includes ticket, tax & gratuity!
Allagash White….
– paired with Grilled Clams – Leek Butter – Charred Corn – Herbs
Duchesse Cherry…
– paired with Marinated Golden Beets – Shaved Brussels – Whipped Goat Cheese – Cherry Infused Honey
Delirium Tremens…
– paired with Lobster Salad – Focaccia – Pickled Fennel – Tarragon
St Bernardus Abt 12…
– paired with Pork Tenderloin – Cheddar Potato Puree – Rum Raisin Chutney – Crunchy Veggie Slaw
Find Us At
99 Bottles
1445 2nd St
Sarasota
,
FL
34236
United States
+ Google Map
941-487-7874
